original_text: The throne had six steps, and its back had a rounded top. On both sides of the seat were armrests, with a lion standing beside each of them.
korean_text: 그 보좌에는 여섯 층계가 있고 보좌 뒤에 둥근 머리가 있고 앉는 자리 양쪽에는 팔걸이가 있고 팔걸이 곁에는 사자가 하나씩 서 있으며

sentences.original_text: and its back had a rounded top.
On both sides of the seat were armrests,
with a lion standing beside each of them.
sentences.korean_translation: 각각의 팔걸이 옆에는 사자가 서 있었다.
